document.full_text: a western colorado man was arrested and charged on thursday with the death of his one-year-old daughter, who ingested a fatal amount of the painkiller oxycodone.
document.title: colorado man charged in toddler's death from overdose
lines_and_colors: a western colorado man was arrested and charged on thursday with the death of his one-year-old daughter, who ingested a fatal amount of the painkiller oxycodone.
